alert.note: Alert for Monroe (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 28 at 12:11PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...AN AREA OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT NORTHEASTERN MONROE COUNTY... At 1210 PM EST, a snow shower was located over Canadensis, or 7 miles northeast of Mount Pocono, moving southeast at 30 mph. Light snow may accumulate on bridges and overpasses and other elevated surfaces, creating slippery conditions. Locations impacted include... Mount Pocono, East Stroudsburg, Tobyhanna, Delaware Water Gap, Henryville, Werry Lake, Analomink, Skytop, Mountainhome, Canadensis, Alpine Mountain, Echo Lake, Paradise Valley, Gouldsboro State Park, Stroudsburg, Cresco, Shawnee, Marshalls Creek, Hidden Lake, and Arlington Heights. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 312 and 314. Interstate 380 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 5 and 12. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
